feed.title: Category: Life | Kevin Crawford, Web Developer

entry.title: When a Fire Starts to Burn
entry.content: I've just been bursting at the seams to post this good news. Today is my first day of work at Chirp, a social media startup based right here in Long Beach. The team is awesome, and I couldn't be more excited to learn and grow as a developer, working on something big in the process. Thank you guys for such an amazing opportunity, and thank you to my previous employer, Gunn/Jerkens & Epraxa, for a wonderful 6.5 years. Here's to the new road ahead!
